column1: What is the difference between Symbol and String?
column2: The symbol in Ruby on rails act the same way as the string but the difference is in their behaviors that are opposite to each other.

column1: What is the function of garbage collection in Ruby on Rails?
column2: Garbage collection allows the removal of the pointer values that is left behind when the execution of the program ends.
